account.locked: Your account has been locked. Please contact an administrator
account.activated: Your account isn't activated. Please click the email link to activate

messages.success: Your user account has been activated.
messages.error: Your user could not be activated.

newpassword.title: New password
newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 4 characters.
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

confirmpassword.title: New password confirmation
confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirmation password is required to be at least 4 characters.
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

resetpassword.title: Please enter the email address used to register

success.email.sent: Please check your new emails and follow the instructions to reset your password.

error.init: Your password couldn't be reset. Remember a password request is only valid for 24 hours.
error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

help.create: At the end of the product creation, you will be redirected to the group management page to add the product to one of it
help.profiles: List of product profiles, coma separated

help.name: Update name
help.pending: The update file is being processed, please wait

help.step1: Select the product for the update

step2.applied_versions: Select the versions from which the update will be available
step2.applied_versions.placeholder: The applied versions will be displayed here
step2.major_update: Or check to apply all versions (major update)
step2.linked_version.placeholder: The linked version will be displayed here

help.step3.form.invalid: Please fulfill the update properties form

tooltip.next4: Save update and proceed to update's file upload
tooltip.linked_version: The wanted version is not created yet?

summary.productLine: You are going to create an update on product
summary.linkedVersionLine: And will have as linked version
summary.appliedVersionsLine: And will be applied on versions
summary.statusLine: Its status will remain PENDING until the end of the associated file upload

upload.title: File upload

help.new.upload: You will upload a new file for the update {{updateName}}
help.update.upload: You are about to replace the {{updateFileName}} update file of the update {{updateName}}

upload.file.name: File name

hash.please.select: Or select a file containing this hash

upload.uncompressedsize.write: Please enter the size of the update in bytes once uncompressed (optional)
upload.profiles.please.select: Please select one or more profiles
upload.pending: The update file is being processed, please wait.

error.profile.saved: An error occured while saving the settings!

help.atDate: The graphic will represent data at this date. Today by default
help.rangeDate: The graphic will represent data between 'from date' and the 'to date' (excluded)
help.os: The graphic will be filtered by OS
help.arch: The graphic will be filtered by architecture
help.lang: The graphic will be filtered by lang
help.version: The graphic will be filtered by version
help.status: The graphic will be filtered by status
help.state: The graphic will be filtered by state

modal.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{value}} ?
modal.cancel.update.creation: Are you sure you want to cancel the update creation ?
modal.update.state.confirm: Are you sure you want to update the status to {{value}} ?
modal.update.state.suspend: Are you sure you want suspend this update?
modal.upload.check: Are you sure you want to upload another file for this update ?
modal.upload.cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the upload of {{value}} ?
modal.upload.delete: Are you sure you want to delete the upload file '{{value}}'

update.present: An associated file is already present for this update. This file will be deleted if any other file is uploaded
update.status.published: The current update is in PUBLISHED state. THE UPDATE STATUS WILL BE UNPUBLISHED AFTER ANOTHER UPLOAD

warning.update.file.no.default: None of file has 'DEFAULT' as profile

error.version.update.exist: The version is linked to an update. Please delete if before deleting the version
error.image.large: The image's size is too large. Please select an image with a size lower than 64kb
error.linked_version.already_used: The linked version is already used by the update {{value}}
error.applied_version.same: The linked version should not be in applied version list ({{value}})
error.profile.already_used: The profile {{profile}} used in update file '{{fromUpdateFile}}' is already used in update file '{{toUpdateFile}}'
error.upload: An error occured after upload, please retry. If the problem persists, contact your administrator
error.upload.checksum:
The checksum validation failed. Please retry the upload.
If the problem persists, contact your administrator
error.upload.checksum.file.size: The file size containing the checksum is too large (>1ko)

product.created: Produit created. Please consider adding it to at least one group

success.upload:
The upload is now complete.
The status of the update will change to 'Unpublished' after the end of the file processing.
